description:
Danny recaps this week's Southern Charm, which featured pillow party bamboozlement. DANNY ALSO BREAKS DOWN ONE OF THE BEST REAL HOUSEWIVES OF NEW YORK EPISODES OF ALL TIME (DEF TOP-10), WHERE BETHENNY LOSES IT ON LU AND ALL HELL BREAKS LOOSE IN MIAMI.


#RHONY Recap- 30:43ish
